title: Beautifully renovated 2 Bedroom 2 Bath🏡InglewoodInglewood.+.!!!
posting_body: Beautifully renovated 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Condominium in the city of Inglewood.
A MUST SEE TO APPRECIATE all the work that has been put in for the Tenants comfort.
Laminated floors on the bottom level and carpet in the upstairs bedrooms.
The breakfast nook connects to the living room, making for an open space.
ON THE LOWER LEVEL: Living room, kitchen, breakfast nook, bath, and enjoy the enclosed outdoor patio off the living room.
ON THE UPPER LEVEL: Two spacious bedrooms, double-sink bathroom, and in-closet laundry (no need to pay a coin-machine).
There are two assigned parking spaces in the subterranean parking garage, as well as storage.
The tenant pays electricity and gas.
Property is located on a cul-de-sac, with easy access to major freeways, airport, and beaches.

Close to SoFi Stadium (home of the 2022 LA Rams), the forum, near shopping (Century shopping including Costco, Target, and many more)/restaurants, and transportation, including the upcoming La Brea/Florence Metro station.
